title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Device Architecture and Design
description: Design the overall architecture and components of the SensoryCortexStimulator device, including hardware and software components. The design should cover the following aspects: 1) Hardware components (e.g., sensors, stimulators, control unit, power supply) and their specifications, 2) Software components (e.g., firmware, signal processing, user interface, data management), 3) Communication protocols and interfaces, 4) Safety and security considerations, 5) Scalability and extensibility, 6) User experience and ergonomics. The design should be modular and scalable, allowing for future updates or extensions. Furthermore, ensure that the design follows best practices in software engineering and prioritizes user safety. Break down the task into smaller, manageable sub-tasks to facilitate implementation. Provide detailed documentation and diagrams wherever possible.

title: Hardware Development
description: Develop the physical hardware components of the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Software Development
description: Develop the software components for controlling and interfacing with the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Data Management and Storage (Revised)
description: Design and implement a robust, efficient, and secure data management and storage system for the SensoryCortexStimulator device. The system should handle real-time data from sensors, user preferences, and session logs.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Assess and implement security and privacy measures for the SensoryCortexStimulator device and its data.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance processes for the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Develop deployment strategies and DevOps processes for the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the SensoryCortexStimulator device.
